src.java.searchengine

Interface QueryProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrequencyOfQueryWordsProcessor, NormalizedProcessor, WordsInDocumentProcessor

    public interface QueryProcessor
    Takes an InvertedIndex and process it to obtain certain results that then stores on a List of Query objects.
    Since:
    10-16-2017

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processQueries(java.util.List<Query> queries, InvertedIndex idx, double threshold)
      Processes the queries calculates an appropriate result for them and stores results on their respective Query objects.

    • Method Detail

      • processQueries

        void processQueries(java.util.List<Query> queries,
                    InvertedIndex idx,
                    double threshold)
        Processes the queries calculates an appropriate result for them and stores results on their respective Query objects. The results are only stored if they are equal or higher than the threshold value.
        Parameters:
        queries - A List of Query objects that contains the term of the query and where the results will be stored.
        idx - An InvertedIndex that contains the index terms of the corpus
        threshold - The minimum values of the result scores
